card.name: Aegnor
card.text: Unique. Noldo. tap: at a site where Information is playable to test a gold ring in his company.

card.name: Andovon Pathdal
card.text: Unique. Sinda. May use any bow as if a warrior. Discard if he is ever at a site that is not in Eriador or its adjacent regions.

attr.value: Grey Havens, any Refuge in Eriador

card.name: Aramacar
card.text: Unique. Sinda. Unless he is among the starting characters, he may only be brought into play at his home site. +1 prowess against Orcs and Undead. +3 EI against the Elves of Taur Rómen faction. Discard Aramacar if you have Bad Company in play, or if a Dwarf or Man character without Elf-friend is in his company outside of the organization phase.

card.name: Arhendhiril
card.text: Unique. Sinda. +1 EI against Elves. +4 EI against Legolas and Thranduil. tap: give +1 to any CC made by Legolas or Thranduil (if in her company) this turn.

card.name: Ascarnil
card.text: Unique. Silvan. Unless he is among the starting characters, he may only be brought into play at his home site. +1 prowess against Trolls. tap: during the organization phase if at a non-Haven [H] site in Rhudaur or its adjacent regions to force an opponent to reveal 2 cards at random from his hand.

card.name: Bladorthin
card.text: Unique. Sinda. Unless he is among the starting characters, he may only be brought into play at his home site. +1 prowess against Orcs and Undead. +1 EI against Elves. If you are Thranduil your GI is modified by -3. If Thranduil is eliminated, Bladorthin may replace him as your Elf-lord: all stage cards specific to Thranduil may then be transferred to or played on Bladorthin, and the values in parenthesis apply. He receives Thranduil’s Halls as an additional home site.

card.name: Celeborn, Lord of Lórien
card.text: Unique. Sinda. Galadriel specific. Manifestation of Celeborn. Leader. +2 EI against Elves. +1 prowess against Orcs. +1 to your hand size if he is at Lórien and Galadriel is not. May only be controlled by Galadriel or GI. -2 mp if eliminated.

card.name: Celebrían
card.text: Unique. Noldo. +1 EI against Elves. +4 EI against Arwen, Elladan, Elrohir and Elrond. While moving to a non-Haven [H] site all other Elves in her company receive +1 prowess. -2 mp if eliminated.

card.name: Celedhring
card.text: Unique. Noldo. +2 to his CC if bearing a ring item. If played as a hero character, discard Celedhring at the end of the organization phase if he does not bear a ring. tap: during your organization phase to test a gold ring item in the company. Celedring must make a CC modified by subtracting the mp of the ring that is played as a result after the test.

card.name: Círdan the Shipwright
card.text: Unique. Sinda. Manifestation of Círdan. Leader. +2 EI against Elves. +2 EI against the Elves of Lindon faction. When Círdan is at Grey Havens you may keep one more card than normal in your hand. tap: cancel an attack keyed to a Coastal Sea [c] region or to Lindon (by name or type).

card.name: Círdor
card.text: Unique. Sinda. +1 EI against Elves. +2 prowess against attacks keyed to a Coastal Sea [c] region or a site therein, and against creatures normally keyable to Coastal Seas and ahunt Dragons attacking in a Coastal Sea region. If you are Círdan, he requires only 4 points of influence to control. Tap Círdor after the movement/hazard phase if he is not at a Port or site with a Coastal Sea in its site path.

card.name: Elrond Half-elven
card.text: Unique. Noldo. Sinda. Half-elf. Manifestation of Elrond. Leader. +2 EI against Elves. When Elrond is at Rivendell you may keep one more card than normal in your hand. Can use spells as if a Wizard (except Sacrifice of Form). You may win the game by successfully playing Gollum’s Fate or Cracks of Doom.

card.name: Elven Handmaid
card.text: Silvan. Elven Handmaid costs no influence to control if controlled by an Elf with mind 8 or more. Cannot be duplicated in a given company. tap: give +1 to any CC made by Elves in the same company until the end of the turn.

card.name: Emissary of the House
card.text: Noldo. +2 EI against hero factions. Cannot be duplicated in a given company.

card.name: Erestor
card.text: Unique. Noldo. +3 EI against Elves. tap: discard a corruption or disease card played on his company or an associated entity.

card.name: Fanar
card.text: Unique. Nando. +1 EI against Elves.+1 prowess against Orcs and Wolves. tap: untap a bow he bears.

card.name: Galadriel
card.text: Unique. Noldo. Manifestation of Galadriel.+2 EI against Elves. When Galadriel is at Lórien you may keep one more card than normal in your hand. May not bear any manifestation of The One Ring. tap: take one Cup of Farewell from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Huinen
card.text: Unique. Noldo. Unless he is among the starting characters, he may only be brought into play at his home site. +2 EI against Elves. If in the same company as Bladorthin your GI is increased by 2. You may choose to shuffle any Secret News into your play deck instead of discarding it from play.

card.name: Legolas of Greenwood
card.text: Unique. Sinda. Manifestation of Legolas. +2 EI against the Wood-elves faction. If a song has been played on him or an entity in the company this turn, he receives +1 prowess and +1 to his CC.

card.name: Mallorn-dweller
card.text: Nando. tap: cancel an attack against his company keyed to single Wilderness [w]. Only one Mallorn-dweller may tap in this fashion per turn per company.

card.name: Othar
card.text: Unique. Sinda. +3 EI against the Raft-elves faction. tap: and discard (for no effect) a Lock nor Bar May Hinder to take control of a non-unique minor item; the item must be taken from your play deck and must normally be playable at Celebannon.

card.name: Prisoner from Ost-in-Edhil
card.text: Unique. Noldo. Sauron specific. May not be among the starting characters. May only be brought into play atBarad-dûr and only with a company bearing a ring item. +2 to any rolls to test a gold ring in his company. +2 to his CC when bearing a ring special item. Tap him if he is in a minion company without a ring. Cannot be assigned a strike in CvCC. If stored as a Prisoner at an Elf-hold, Prisoner from Ost-in-Edhil may be brought into play as a hero character; he costs only 5 points of influence to control if controlled by a hero Elf.

card.name: Rúmil
card.text: Unique. Nando. -1 to all of his CC. If in a company with Haldir or Orophin their company’s hazard limit is reduced by 1 (to a minimum of 1).

card.name: Shipwright
card.text: Sinda. During the organization phase you may discard a Great Ship from hand to allow his company to move with Port movement or to move up to two additional Coastal Sea [c] regions (to a maximum of 6).

card.name: Tharúdan
card.text: Unique. Sinda. +1 EI against Elves. +2 EI against the Elves of Edhellond faction. If Moon is in play, Tharúdan may play Far Sight at any site in a Coastal Sea [c] region (as if Information were playable there); and also at tapped sites if Star of High Hope is in play.

card.name: Thranduil
card.text: Unique. Sinda. Manifestation of Thranduil. Leader. +3 EI against Elves. +2 EI against the Wood- elves faction. When Thranduil is at Thranduil’s Halls you may keep one more card than normal in your hand. tap: cancel an attack against his company keyed to a region or site in Mirkwood.

card.name: Wood-elf
card.text: Silvan. tap: cancel an Animal or Awakened Plant attack against his company. Only one Wood-elf may tap in this fashion per turn per company.

card.name: Big Bats
card.text: Animals. 6 strikes. As a creature, playable keyed to any Shadow-hold [S]. As a short-event, playable on an Orc or Wolf creature attack: attacker chooses defending characters for the attack.

card.name: Black Crows
card.text: Animals. 6 strikes. As a creature, playable keyed to any non-Under-deeps Ruins & Lairs [R]. As a short-event, you can bring from your discard pile to your hand any one hazard you played as a creature this movement/hazard phase; cannot be duplicated per hazard/movement phase.

card.name: Boars
card.text: Animals. Boars. 2 strikes. +1 strike if Spring of Arda is in play.

card.name: Bregalad
card.text: Unique. Awakened Plant. Manifestation of Quickbeam. 1 strike. Attacker chooses defending characters. Detainment and -2 prowess against hero or covert companies.

card.name: Choked with Vanity
card.text: Playable on an Elf-lord. All resources that can be stored and that are not in the Elf-lord’s company or stored at an Elf-haven [H] are never worth more than 1 mp (overriding all other card effects). Cannot be duplicated on an Elf-lord.

card.name: Crossing the Border
card.text: Playable on a company that is not moving. The company faces an attack that is an exact copy of one automatic-attack of a site in the same region or of an adjacent Under-deeps site (attacker’s choice).

card.name: Curse Him, Root and Branch!
card.text: All Awakened Plant attacks against minion companies and against companies of Dwarf-lord or Fallen- wizard players (except Gandalf or Radagast) attack normally, not as detainment. Invert this card when such an attack is defeated. If this card is inverted, all Awakened Plant attacks receive +1 prowess and +1 strike. When an opponent’s company defeats an Awakened Plant attack, place this card in his mp if already inverted. Discard when any play deck is exhausted. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Dark Heart
card.text: Playable on a site with an Awakened Plant automatic-attack (does not count against the hazard limit). Awakened Plant automatic- attack(s) at this site cannot be cancelled this turn. Additionally, if revealed as an on-guard card, attacker chooses defending characters for such attacks.

card.name: Decision of the White Council
card.text: Playable if there are at least 3 manifestations of Wizards and/or Elf-lords in play (4 if any of these are characters). Discard when these conditions are not met. Up to 3 hazard long-events (cannot be environments or manifestations of a unique creature) may be placed with this card. These long-events stay in play until this card is discarded. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Elf-lord Revealed in Wrath*
card.text: Elf. 1 strike. Detainment against hero companies. +4 prowess against Ringwraiths. If Gates of Morning is in play, may also be played keyed to Shadow-lands [s]. May also be played keyed to any Elf-hold, if a hero company is present at the site.

card.name: Elven Archer
card.text: Elf. 1 strike. Playable only against overt companies. May also be played keyed to any Elf-hold or region containing an Elf-hold. Attacker chooses defending characters. Against companies moving with Flying movement: +4 prowess and any resulting body checks are modified by +1. Each ranger in the attacked company lowers Elven Archer’s body by 1. Unless the attack is cancelled or defeated, any resource that requires a scout or ranger in target company cannot be played for the rest of the turn.

card.name: Elven Custody
card.text: Playable on a non-avatar character facing a non- detainment strike from an Elf attack. The strike receives +2 prowess. If the strike is successful, target character is not harmed but taken prisoner at the nearest Elf-hold (attacker’s choice); discard any items he controls. At the start of his untap phase, if target character is an overt character, he must make a body check. Rescue-attack: Elves — 3 strikes with 10 prowess.

card.name: Elven Wards
card.text: Each company moving through Hollin or Woodland Realm, or at or moving to an Elf-hold or (any version of) a protected Elf-lord Haven [H], must make a roll modified by: +2 for an overt company and -2 for a hero company. If the result is: 0 to 8, tap all characters in the company with mind 4 or less; 9 to 11, the company must return to its site of origin; 12+ all characters in the company must make a body check; a character failing this body check is wounded, or eliminated if already wounded.

card.name: Evenstar of Her People
card.text: Unique. Elf. Manifestation of Arwen. 1 strike. Detainment against hero companies. As a creature, may be played keyed to Rhudaur and Wold & Foothills; or at sites in these regions. As a permanent event, any minion player cannot draw more than two cards during his turn (except when resolving handsize).

card.name: Falathrim
card.text: Elves. 5 strikes. Detainment and -3 prowess against heroand covert companies. Playable keyed to any region containing a hero Haven [H] and bordering on a Coastal Sea [c], and to its adjacent Coastal Sea regions. If The Watchful Peace is in play, may also be played keyed to any Coastal Sea region. If all strikes are successful against an overt company, the company must return to its site of origin. As a short-event, playable at any time by a hero player to cancel an attack by Pirates or Corsairs of Umbar keyed to any of the above named regions.

card.name: Fangorn*
card.text: Unique. Awakened Plant. Manifestation of Treebeard. 2 strikes. Detainment and -2 prowess against hero and covert companies. As a creature, playable keyed to Fangorn, Rohan, Gap of Isen, Wold & Foothills, Enedhwaith, Old Pûkel-land, Brown Lands, Anduin Vales, or Redhorn Gate, and to Border-holds [B] and Ruins & Lairs [R] in these regions; If played as a short-event, bring one Awakened Plant hazard creature from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Finglas
card.text: Unique. Awakened Plant. Manifestation of Leaflock. 1 strike. Detainment and -2 prowess against hero andcovert companies. As a creature, playable keyed to Fangorn, Rohan, Gap of Isen, Wold & Foothills, Enedhwaith, Old Pûkel-land, Brown Lands, Anduin Vales, or Redhorn Gate, and to Border-holds [B] and Ruins & Lairs [R] in these regions. As a short-event, play to cancel a resource event declared earlier in the same chain of effects, if the company has faced an Awakend Plant attack this turn.

card.name: Fladrif
card.text: Unique. Awakened Plant. Manifestation of Skinbark. 1 strike. Detainment and -2 prowess against hero or covert companies. Playable keyed to Fangorn, Rohan, Gap of Isen, Wold & Foothills, Anduin Vales, Redhorn Gate, or Misty Mountains - Southern Spur; or to Border-Holds [B] and Ruins & Lairs [R] in these regions.

card.name: Goldberry, Daughter of the River
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of Goldberry. The hazard limit for overt companies at or moving to a site in Arthedain, Cardolan, Hollin, Old Forest, Rhudaur or The Shire is increased by one. The Oldest may be played on such a company. Additionally, every minion company moving through one of the above named regions must tap two rangers (instead of one) to cancel the effects of River or Enchanted Stream.

card.name: He Is Lost to Us
card.text: Playable on a Lord or Fallen-wizard, if youropponent has 6 P or more. All creatures with an asterix (*) that are not of the same race as opponent’s avatar attack normally against the company, not as detainment. Opponent receives full kill mp for such defeated creatures. If this card would normally be discarded, place it in opponent’s mp.

card.name: Lord of the Woods
card.text: Unique. Elf. Manifestation of Thranduil. 1 strike. Detainment and -3 prowess against hero companies. May be played keyed toWoodland Realm, Western Mirkwood, Heart of Mirkwood, Northern Rhovanion or Grey Mountain Narrows; or at sites in these regions. As a permanent-event, no attack keyed to the above named regions or at sites therin is considered detainment against overt or minion companies. Additionally, any company moving in these regions faces an attack: Elves — 2 strikes with 10 prowess (detainment against hero companies). You may return Lord of the Woods to your hand, which counts as 1 against the hazard limit.

card.name: Pride
card.text: Any character playing or using a card requiring a skill or race must make a CC modified by -1. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Protecting Their Domain
card.text: All creature attacks keyed to Jungle [j] or Wilderness [w] receive -1 prowess. All attacks by Animals, Spiders and Awakened Plants receive +2 prowess (+3 for Awakened Plants keyed to Jungle [j] or Wilderness [w]). Discard this card when an attack by Animals, Spiders or Awakened Plants is defeated. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Sentinel of the Grove
card.text: Playable on a non-Dragon’s lair Ruins & Lairs [R] in a Wilderness [w]. May also be played on an Oasis site. The site gains an additional automatic-attack: Awakened Plant — 1 strike with 10 prowess. Discard this card when the site leaves active play.

card.name: Shifting Paths
card.text: Playable on a moving company with more Wilderness [w] or Jungle [j] regions in its site path than there are avatar and ranger characters and/or maia, Ent or awakened plant allies in the company. Replace the company’s new site with a site card from your location deck in the same or an adjacent region.

card.name: Sons of Elrond
card.text: Unique. Elves. Manifestation of Elladan and Elrohir. 2 strikes.+2 prowess against Orcs. Detainment againsthero companies. Attacker chooses defending characters. Playable keyed to Rhudaur and its adjacent regions; may also be keyed to sites in these regions if the company contains a leader or a Ringwraith. May also be played on a company that has faced Elves upon Errantry this turn. Any character wounded by Sons of Elrond must discard one item he controls.As a short-event, target and cancel an effect that would cancel an attack or strike from an Elf creature.

card.name: The Dark Days
card.text: Elf-lord player’s companies must use minion versions for all Dwarf-holds; his Dwarf factions are never worth any mp. Dwarf-lord player’s companies must use minion versions for all Elf-holds; his Elf factions are never worth any mp. Companies containing an Elf-lord may attack any company that contains a Dwarf and no Elf or Wizard. Companies containing a Dwarf-lord may attack any company that contains an Elf and no Dwarf or Wizard. At the end of a player’s organisation phase, discard any Dwarf not controlled by EI and in a company with an Elf with a lower mind. Discard when any play deck is exhausted. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: The Oldest
card.text: Unique. Maia. Manifestation of Tom Bombadil. 2 strikes. Detainment and -3 prowess against hero and non-Ringwraith covert companies. As a creature, may be played keyed to Old Forest; or at sites in this region. Ring abilities cannot cancel a strike or attack from The Oldest. As a permanent-event, no minion or overt company may move to a site in Old Forest.

card.name: Tree-herder
card.text: Awakened Plant. 1 strike. Detainment against any company containing an Elf or a Hobbit. May also be played following an attack by a unique Awakened Plant creature against the same company. Unless Tree-herder’s attack is cancelled or defeated, all other Awakened Plant attacks against the company this turn receive +1 strike and +1 prowess.

card.name: Wrath of the Olvar
card.text: All Awakened Plant attacks receive +1 strike, and attacker chooses defending characters. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Yavanna's Plea
card.text: All Awakened Plant attacks receive +1 prowess and+1 body (or 4 body if the attack has no body). Discard when any play deck is exhausted. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: A Friend of Yore
card.text: Unique. Prisoner. Playable during the site phase at Barad-dûron an Elf or Dúnadan character with mind 5 or more.Tap the character. The company faces 2 attacks: Orcs — 3 strikes with 9 prowess; Trolls — 2 strikes with 10 prowess. This card comes into play inverted; it may be stored at an Elf- hold. Target character may not untap while this card is inverted. Re-invert this card if the company is at an Elf-hold or plays or uses (for no effect) a card with a healing effect. If at an Elf-hold during the organization phase, you may place this card in your out of play pile and bring Prisoner from Ost-in-Edhil into play as a hero character; he may be taken also from sideboard or discard pile..

card.name: A Long Good Talk
card.text: Playable on Gandalf, Radagast, or a manifestation of an Elf-lord. Cannot be duplicated by a given player. If in the company, Treebeard andTom Bombadil are not discarded as per their card text when moving to Tom’s House and/or Wellinghall. If both these allies are in the same company you may place them in your mp with this card: it is worth 1 mp and you may tap both (at any time) to either:* Discard Rolled Down to the Sea or The Balance of Things before it resolves;* Give +2 to a ring test, or take one Cracks of Doom, Favor of the Valar, or The Old Thrush from your discard pile to your hand;* Store Fate of the Ithil Stone or Into the Smoking Cone (if inverted) at Mount Doom or Barad-dûr as if at a Haven [H].* Make Awakened Plant creatures playable against minion companies at your avatar’s current site.

card.name: Ancient Knowledge
card.text: Playable on an Elf with mind 5 or more at a Haven [H]. When a Stolen Knowledge or Lost Knowledge card is required to be discarded from the company, you may discard this card instead.

card.name: Ancient Skill and Wisdom
card.text: Playable on an Elf with mind 8 or more(7 or more if a Noldo) at a Haven [H]. Target Elf may use spells as if a Wizard (except Sacrifice of Form; if on Glorfindel he may play Sacrifice of Form on a Nazgûl or Spawn attack created by a unique hazard creature or event: keep this card with Sacrifice of Form and place both on Glorfindel when he re-enters play).

card.name: Aranrûth
card.text: Unique. Weapon. Warrior only: +3 prowess (to a maximum of 12) and -2 to target’s body. +2 EI against Sinda Elves. 3 CP if borne by a Sinda. tap: when the company faces an attack to untap a Sinda Elf. Bearer makes a CC.

card.name: Attuning the Blade
card.text: Ritual. Sage only. Playable during the site phase at a site where Information is playable. taTap a sage; place this card on a non-unique minor or major weapon item in the company and choose a type: Giant, Orc, Troll, Undead or Wolf. The weapon gives +2 prowess or -1 body against strikes of the chosen type. Sage makes a CC modified by -2.

card.name: Blood of Huan
card.text: Playable on a Noble Hound controlled by an Elf or a non-overt ranger. +1 to body. The Noble Hound is considered an Elf character for the purpose of cards that modify prowess. tap: allow target Noble Hound to face any number of strikes from an attack. Each strike sequence must be faced separately. Cannot be duplicated on a given Noble Hound.

card.name: Bow of Yew
card.text: Weapon. Warrior only. Cannot be used by a Hobbit. tap: modify the prowess and body of a strike from an attack keyed to a region, that does not choose defending characters, by -1. If bearer is an Elf warrior or Bard Bowman, he may tap and tap this item to modify the prowess and body of a strike of any creature attack by -2.

card.name: Choose a Mortal Life
card.text: Playable on Arwen, Elladan or Elrohir. +1 EI against Dúnedain. Target character is considered to be a Dúnadan (as well as an Elf). Additionally, The Burden of Time cannot be played on him. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Clean the Greenwood
card.text: Trophy. Playable during the site phase on a company at a non- Haven [H] site in Mirkwood (not in Woodland Realm), if Towers Destroyed is rotated at least once. The company faces two of the following attacks (opponent’s choice; cannot be cancelled): Spiders — 5 strikes with 6 prowess; Orcs — 4 strikes with 7 prowess; Trolls 3 — strikes with 8 prowess. Demon — 1 strike with 11 prowess. After the attacks, tap a character in the company or discard this card. This card may be stored at a Haven [H] or at a Free-hold [F] in Mirwood or its adjacent regions. If stored it is worth 2 mp and the prowess/strikes of attacks of the above named types against hero companies at or moving to a site in Mirkwood are modified by -1 (to a minimum of 1). Cannot be duplicated at a given site.

card.name: Cloak of Many Colors
card.text: Discard if not borne by a Wizard or an Elf sage with mind 7 or more. tap: gain one of the following abilities until the end of the turn. * increase your hand size by 1;* draw an extra card for each Wilderness [w] bearer’s company moves through;* ttbearer may tap to test a gold ring;* tbearer may tap during the end-of-turn phase to bring one spell or ritual from your discard pile to your hand;* if at a Haven [H], bearer may join any company facing a creature attack and face a strike;Bearer makes a mCC when this item becomes tapped. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Crisfuin
card.text: Unique. Staff. This item can only be used by a Wizard or Elf-lord. +1 to EI. +1 to prowess (+3 against magic-users). Bearer may make a CC modified by -2 to place one spell from your hand with this item; this spell may be played as if from hand without the required CC. tap: at any time to prevent a non-avatar character at the same site with a mind lower than bearer’s (10 for a Wizard) from using a magic resource.

card.name: Elenya
card.text: Unique. Lesser Ring. Only playable at Telpemár if the company discards (for no effect) a Lost Knowledge card it controls.+1 to body to a maximum of 9. +1 to EI. tap: modify the prowess and body of an Orc, Troll or Undead attack against the company by -1 for each Stars, Star of High Hope or The Evenstar played this turn. Bearer makes a CC.

card.name: Elf-friend
card.text: Playable on a non-Wizard, non-Elf, non-overt character at an Elf-hold. Target character receives +2 EI against Elves, and suffers no negative modification according to his race when attempting to influence Elf factions. Additionally, target character is also considered an Elf for non-environment and non-item resource effects or cards. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Elven Blade
card.text: Playable on Aeglin, Aiglos, Anglachel, Angrist, Anguirel, Glamdring, Kirrauko, Orcrist, Ringil, Sting, Sulhelka, Sword of Gondolin or Ungolcrist. Any Biter and Beater! played on the company also affects this item. tap: give -1 strike to an attack from an Orc, Troll or Undead creature (to a minimum of 1). Bearer makes a CC. Cannot be duplicated on a given item.

card.name: Elven Bridge
card.text: Playable at the end of the organization phase ona moving company containing an Elf bearing Elven Rope. Name a non-Dark-domain [d] region; this region (both type and name) is not considered in the company’s site path for the purpose of playing hazards or interpreting hazard effects.

card.name: Elves of Lothlórien
card.text: Unique. Playable at Lórien if the influence check is greater than 9. Standard Modifications: Elves (+2), Dwarves (-2), characters with home site Lórien (+2). This faction is worth 2 mp if no manifestation of Balrog of Moria is in play.

card.name: Elves of Taur Rómen
card.text: Unique. Playable at Rhûbar if the influence check is greater than 11. Standard Modifications: Elves (+2), Dúnedain (+1), Dwarves (-3), Men (-2), (apply once for each given race in the company). tap: at any time to make Galadhrim playable keyed to any Refuge site in play, or to the Wilderness [w] region containing it.

card.name: Elves of the House
card.text: Unique. Playable at Rivendell if the influence check is greater than 9. Standard Modifications: Elves (+2), Dúnedain (+1), characters with home site Rivendell (+2). This faction is worth 2 mp if a manifestation of Rogrog or The Witch-king of Angmar is in play.

card.name: Essay on Ringcraft
card.text: Lost Knowledge. Playable at Amon Lind, Ostelan or Ost-in-Edhil. If bearer is a sage or Elf with mind 5 or more and at a Haven [H], he may and replace this item with a Lesser Ring or Magic Ring item, which may also be taken from your discard pile, sideboard or play deck (shuffle if searched).

card.name: Great Bow of Lórien
card.text: Unique. Weapon. Playable on Bow of the Galadhrim if borne by Legolas or Fanar.+2 to prowess (to a maximum of 9). You may tap Bow of the Galadhrim to modify a strike another character in the company is facing by a combined value of -3 to prowess and/or body. (also be used during CvCC). Discard this card if Bow of the Galadhrim is not borne by Legolas or Fanar.

card.name: Great Bow of Yew
card.text: Weapon. Warrior only: +2 to prowess to a maximum of 8 (maximum of 9 if borne by an Elf). Cannot be used by a Hobbit. tap: allow its bearer to remain untapped against a strike from an attack keyed to a region, which does not choose defending characters.

card.name: Great Friendship
card.text: Playable on Gimli or Legolas, if both are in the same company and after defeating an attack. Tap Gimli and Legolas if untapped. +1 to body for both characters. If either is controlled by the other he costs only 3 points of influence to control. Both may tap to give +3 to any roll made by the other. You may discard this card to let either character take a strike assigned to the other, to cancel an influence attempt against either character, or to cancel the effects of a hazard that would remove either character from the company. Discard this card if either character leaves active play. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Greenwood the Great
card.text: Information. Playable on a character after the successful play of a faction at a site in Mirkwood. Tap the character. Discard this card to take a character or resource only playable at a site in Mirkwood from your discard pile to your hand. Alternatively, discard this card when CvCC is declared at a site in Mirkwood to untap all unwounded characters in the company and give them +1 prowess this turn. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Hair of Uinen
card.text: Unique. Environment. Cancels the effects of Drowing Seas, Storms of Ossë, and Winds of Wrath. Additionally, if Gatesof Morning is in play, an Elf or Dúnadan may tap to give -2 prowess or -1 body to a hazard creature attack against his company keyed to or at a Coastal Sea [c] region (by type or name).

card.name: Healing Song
card.text: Song. Playable on an Elf. Target Elf makes a CC modified by -1 for every hazard environment in play and by +1 for every hero resource environment in play. If successfull he may heal himself or another Elf in his company or at the same site (from wounded to tapped) after the 4th phase after the play of this card (rotate this card by 90° each phase or place a token to keep track of your phases).

card.name: New Closeness to His Kin
card.text: Playable on a hero company. One minion Elf (including an agent) may be played as a hero character with target company at a Haven [H]. Place this card with the Elf: +1 to his mind. Discard target character and this card if he is the only Elf in the company. This card may be played with a starting company in lieu of a minor item. When played as such, reveal it as if it were a character. Cannot be duplicated on a given company.

card.name: Light of the Lady
card.text: Unique. Playable on Galadriel. If she is at Lórien you may now bring Lady of the Golden Wood into play from your hand, discard pile or sideboard (overriding any conflicting rules). Discard Lady of the Golden Wood if Galadriel is not at Lórien. Additionally, if you are Galadriel, this card gives 1 P and you may play True Fána on Lady Galadriel as if she were a Wizard: modify her prowess for True Fána by +2 (+4 if Nenya has been played the same turn).

card.name: Looking from Mind to Mind
card.text: Playable during the organization phase on a companyof 3 or more characters with a majority of Elves. An Elf or Wizard in the company may tap to untap another Elf or Wizard in the company with an equal or lower mind (10 for a Wizard). Discard this card when the company size is below 3, when Elves are no longer a majority in the company, or when any play deck is exhausted.

card.name: Of the Green-elves
card.text: Playable on a company containing only Elves, Wizards and/or Hobbits. You may tap a Nando or Silvan Elf for each Wilderness [w] in the company’s site path to lower the hazard limit by one. Environment hazards and creatures that require two or more Wilderness in the site path do not count against the hazard limit for the rest of the movement/hazard phase.

card.name: Profitable Trade
card.text: Place this card in your mp. Any unique non-aninal, non-overt, non-special faction you have in play may be placed with this card; if there is a faction under this card, any additional factions must be playable at different sites in the same or adjacent region (or in the same territory) as a faction under this card. This card is worth 2 mp if there are at least 3 factions of different race placed with it.

card.name: Raft-elves
card.text: Unique. Playable at Celebannon if the influence check is greater than 10. Standard Modifications: Elves (+2), Dwarves (-2) (apply once for each race in the company), Wood-elves (+2), Men of Dorwinion (+1). tap: bring one Down the Hurrying Waters from your discard pile to your play deck (reshuffle).

card.name: Reconstructed Towers
card.text: Unique. Playable during the site phase on The White Towers, if your company there contains at least 3 Elves and the stage version of The White Towers is not in play. All companies at the site face an attack: Wolves — 4 strikes with 9 prowess (cannot be cancelled). Following the attack, tatap an Elf or discard this card. If this card is not discarded, discard any manifestation of Palantír of Elostirion in play. The site is never discarded or returned to the location deck. All versions of The White Towers become a Free-hold [F]. Fallen-wizards may not use the stage version and may not play any stage cards on The White Towers. Replace all automatic-attacks with: (1st) Elves — each character faces 1 strike with 9 prowess (detainment against hero and covert companies); (2nd) Elves — 2 strikes with 11 prowess (against overt company only). An Elf-lord receives full mp for this card.

card.name: Royal Duo
card.text: Unique. Playable on Galadriel if Celeborn is in the same company. Tap Galadriel and Celeborn if untapped. If both are in the same company any influence attempt either of them makes is modified by adding the unused EI of the other. Discard this card if either one leaves active play.

card.name: Sail to the West
card.text: Playable during the organization phase on a non-avatar Elf at Grey Havens, if Círdan or Círdor is there. Tap thesite if untapped. Target Elf must make a CC. If still in play afterwards, place him “off to the side” with this card; store any items he controls and discard any allies. Character is not worth any mp. No other character may be played at Grey Havens this turn. This card may also be played on an opponent’s character or revealed agent, in which case it is worth 1 mp to opponent instead (non-battle-gear items may be transferred to other characters in his company).

card.name: Seekers of Knowledge
card.text: Place this card in your mp. You may store any Lost Knowledge or Stolen Knowledge resource under this card at a Haven [H]. Only one copy of such resource may be under this card. This card is worth 1 mp for each card stored under it (to a maximum of 5). This card is worth full mp to a Pallando or Saruman player. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Shipwrights of Lindon
card.text: Playable on a character with home site Grey Havens. If moving to a Port or site in a Coastal Sea [c] region, you may discard (for no effect) one Fair Sailing, Great Ship, Stars or The Evenstar from hand and tap target character to replace the company’s new site with a Port or site in a Coastal Sea region; this site must be in the same or an adjacent region as the site originally moved to. You may discard this card to bring one Fair Sailing, Stars or The Evenstar from your discard pile to your play deck (reshuffle). Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Soul-piercing
card.text: Playable on Galadriel. One of your opponent’s characters at Galadriel’s current site (your choice) must make a CCmodified by -2. If the character fails this CC you may look at opponent’s hand. Otherwise opponent may remove a corruption card from the character. Cannot be duplicated on a given turn for a given character

card.name: Spirit of Celebrian
card.text: Unique. Playable only if a hero Elf character with mind 8 or more is in play. All hero Elf and Dúnadan characters with home site Rivendell or Lórien receive +5 prowess against Orcs. When this card would normally be discarded, remove it from the game along with one non- unique Orc hazard creature, which opponent has revealed to you through a mechanism of the game (your choice).

card.name: Sulhelka
card.text: Unique. Playable at any Dark-hold [D], if the company has faced a Nazgûl attack the same turn. Weapon. Values in parenthesis apply to an Elf bearer. +2 EI against Elves and Dwarves. Warrior only: +3 prowess to a maximum of 9 (+4 to a maximum of 10 against Orcs, Trolls, Drakes and Undead). Sage only: tap: play Bitter Cold from your discard pile or sideboard (no CC required). Bearer cannot be affected or targeted by fire or heat attacks (e.g. Dragon’s Breath, The Black Enemy’s Wrath, Some Secret Art of Flame, etc).

card.name: The High Sea
card.text: Unique. Playable on a non-avatar Elf character in any out of play pile, if you discard (for no effect) from hand a Favor of the Valar or Returned Beyond All Hope. May also be played on an Elf placed “off to the side” with Sail to the West. Make a roll, adding the character’s mind; if the result is greater than 10, the character may be brought into play under GI at Grey Havens (discard Sail to the West). Otherwise, discard this card. Alternatively, playable on an Elf with mind 6 or more placed “off to the side” with Sail to the West. The character is worth full mp to you.

card.name: The Three Are Together
card.text: Unique. Playable during the organization phase on a company at a Haven [H] containing manifestations of Elrond, Galadriel and Gandalf (or Círdan if Realm of Narya is in play). +2 to prowess, +2 EI and +2 to CC for the above named characters in the company. Discard this card if one of them leaves the company.

card.name: The Wood of Greenleaves
card.text: Unique. Playable if Clean the Greenwood or Pass the Doors of Dol Guldur is in play. Each of your unique factions in play at sites inMirkwood or its adjacent regions may tap to give -1 to prowess and strikes of rescue-attacks or attacks from Rescue Prisoners your companies face at sites in Mirkwood (to a minimum of 1). Additionally, if you receive mp for Profitable Trade with factions played in Wilderland, Woodland Realm becomes a Free-domain [f], Heart of Mirkwood and Western Mirkwood become Border-lands [b] and Southern Mirkwood becomes a Shadow-land [s]. Automatic- attacks at minion Free-holds [F] and Border-holds [B] in Mirkwood receive +2 prowess and cannot be cancelled. CvCC is no longer cancelled by Dol Guldur’s site effect. Hazard limit against minion companies moving through a region of Mirkwood is increased by 1.

card.name: Towers Destroyed
card.text: Playable on a company at Lórien or a site in Woodland Realm. May also be played on your starting company in lieu of a minor item, if youstart the game at one of these sites. tDuring the site phase at Dol Guldur the company may face an attack based on the number of times this card is rotated: none: Orcs — 3 strikes with 8 prowess; Once: Trolls — 2 strikes with 9 prowess; Twice: Nazgûl — 1 strike with 15 prowess; Thrice: Fallen-Maia — 1 strike with 20 prowess. If such an attack is defeated, tap an avatar or warrior in the company to rotate this card 90° (or place a token). If rotated 360°, place this card with Dol Guldur for 5 mp: all versions of the site become a Ruins & Lairs [R]. Dol Guldur is considered a Darkhaven [kK] for starter movement only and does not leave active play. Southern Mirkwood becomes a Shadow-land [s]. Cannot be duplicated on Dol Guldur.

card.name: Ulmo's Watch
card.text: Unique. Playable if you tap an Elf with mind 7 or more (5 or more if a Sinda). If a hero company moves with at least 3 Wilderness [www] in their site path or to a site in a Coastal Sea [c] region, an Elf, Dúndadan, Maia or Wizard in the company may tap to reveal a card played on-guard at their new site. Additionally, if Gates of Morning is in play their hazard limit is reduced by 1 (to a minimum of 2).

card.name: Ungolcrist
card.text: Unique. Playable at Shelob’s Lair. Weapon. +2 prowess to a maximum of 8. Warrior only: +4 prowess against Spiders (to a maximum of 10) and -3 to target’s body. Bearer must make a CC modified by +1 when his company faces a Spider attack; bearer must be assigned the first strike from such an attack and must make an additional CC modified by -1 if the attack is cancelled.

card.name: Very Active Governess
card.text: Unique. Playable on Galadriel if Royal Duo isin play. Once per phase Galadriel may make a CC: if still in play afterwards she may untap.

card.name: Welcomed by the Lord and the Lady
card.graphics: Welcomed by the Lord and the Lady.jpg
card.text: Unique. This card may only be played with your starting company in lieu of a minor item, if you have 2 Elves with home site Lórien in play. You may start the game at Lórien and bring your Wizard or Lord into play there. Discard this card if you do not control at least 2 characters with Lórien as a home site, or if you have 6 P or more.

card.name: Well Aimed
card.text: Playable on a character bearing and able to use a bow, if another character in his company is facing a non-detainment strike. Make a roll adding the character’s prowess and the mp of the bow he is bearing. If the result is higher than the strike’s prowess, modify the strike by a combined value of -3 to prowess and/or body. Cannot be duplicated on a given strike for a given character..

card.name: A Flush of Air
card.text: Unique. Elrond specific. Place this card on Elrond if he is in play. tap: during your end-of-turn phase (if on Elrond) to take one Far-Sight, Test of Lore, or Wisdom to Wield from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: A Lady Rules upon Arda
card.text: Galadriel specific. Playable on Galadriel if sheis at Lórien and bears The One Ring. Only one A Lady Rules upon Arda may be played on a given turn. Make a roll during each of your end-of-turn phases if Galadriel is untapped and at Lórien. Add one for each A Lady Rules upon Arda you have in play. If the result is less than 6, Galadriel is eliminated. If the result is greater than 9, you win the game.

card.name: A Long-hoarded Treasure
card.text: Unique. Playable on Círdan if he is at Grey Havens and Reconstructed Towers is in play. Palantír of Elostirion is not discarded as per its card text when its bearer moves from The White Towers to Grey Havens (or vice versa). If you are Círdan, you may play A New Ringlord as if he were a Fallen-wizard; you may also play it at The White Towers (as if at a Ruins & Lairs [R]).

card.name: Accept the Offering
card.text: Unique. Galadriel specific. Playable on an untapped Galadriel at Lórien, if The One Ring is also at Lórien. Tap Galadriel and the bearer of The One Ring (if untapped). Both characters must make a CC modified by -4. If both are still in play afterwards, Galadriel takes control of The One Ring; otherwise discard this card.

card.name: Against All Councel
card.text: Playable if you are Elrond or Thranduil and your avatar is at his home site and bears The One Ring. Only 1 Against All Council may be played on a given turn. During your end-of-turn phase your avatar must make a CC for every hero avatar and character with a mind of 8 or more at his site. If still in play afterwards, make a roll and add 1 for each Against All Council you have in play: if the result is less than 5, your avatar is eliminated. If the result is greater than 8, you win the game.

card.name: Arsenal of Lindon
card.text: Unique. Círdan specific. Whenever a battle-gear item is stored at Grey Havens it must be placed under this card instead. Items under this card are considered “off to the side” and yield no mp. You may play any item under Arsenal of Lindon at Grey Havens (as if from hand). If during your organization phase there are at least 3 items under this card, you may take one non-unique, non-hoard minor or major battle-gear item from your sideboard or discard pile and place it under this card. If there are at least 4 items under Arsenal of Lindon it is worth 2 mp. Discard this card if Grey Havens is not in play.

card.name: Captain of the House
card.text: Unique. Elrond specific. Playable on Glorfindel at Rivendell (or in your starting company). Glorfindel becomes a leader, requires only 6 points of influence to control and can only be controlled by Elrond or GI. He receives +1 prowess against Nazgûl, Spawn and Dragons, and the body of such strikes against him is modified by -1. Discard this card if Glorfindel is not in a company with Elrond and moves to a site that is not in Eriador or its adjacent regions. tap: during your end-of-turn phase to take one Power Against the Shadow from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Chief-guardian
card.text: Unique. Galadriel specific. Playable on Fanar. +1 EI against Elves with home site Lórien. Fanar requires only 2 points of influence to control and may only be controlled by Galadriel or GI. Discard this card if Fanar is not in a company with Galadriel and moves to a site not in Wold & Foothills or its adjacent regions. Additionally, if he is the highest mind Elf in the company Fanar is a leader. If the company contains only Elves, you choose defending non-wounded characters for any attack that does not choose defending characters, and you assign all strikes during CvCC at a site in a Wilderness [w] region.

card.name: Companions since the Eldar Days
card.text: Elf-lord or Dúnadan-lord only. You may play Elf and Dúnadan characters with mind up to 7 (also in your starting company). Your Elf and Dúnadan characters and factions are worth full mp, if you have at least one of both in play. Additionally, Sentinels of Númenor affects you like a Wizard player. tap: give an extra +1 to the roll when one of your Dúnadan characters taps to support an Elf in his company (or vice versa).Discard this card if you have more than 12 P. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Drive back the Shadow
card.text: Unique. Galadriel specific. Rotate this card 90° (or place a token) each time Galadriel plays Nenya while at a Ruins & Lairs [R], Shadow-hold [S] or Dark-hold [D] in Wilderland or its adjacent regions (only once for each site). For each time rotated you may place such a site with this card instead of discarding it: the region containing the site is now considered a Wilderness [w] for all purposes and all versions are considered a Ruins & Lairs [R]. For each site attached (to a maximum of 4) this card is worth 1 mp and all attacks against hero companies in these regions have their prowess modified by -1. A minion player may discard a site attached to this card by discarding a magic resource or technology special item, if he has a company at the corresponding minion version of that site.

card.name: Fosterhome of Royal Heirs
card.text: Unique. Elrond specific. Place this card on Elrond if he is in play. +3 EI against Dúnedain. Additionally, your Dúnadan characters and factions are worth full mp. Dúnadan characters normally playable by Elrond and with a home site in Eriador may come into play at Rivendell and may be in your starting company.

card.name: In Accord with Nature
card.text: Playable if you are Alatar, Gandalf, Radagast or an Elf-lord. As long as you have more Animal, Wolf, Ent or Awakened Plantallies, more Wose characters, and/or more factions of these types in play than your opponent, they are worth full mp to you. You may only bring Elf, Hobbit, Wose or Wizard characters into play. Discard any characters you have in play of other races when you play this card. Your characters and allies of the above listed types/races may tap to cancel a creature attack of the same type against their company. Your factions of these types may tap to cancel a creature attack of the same type keyed to the region where the faction is in play.Discard this card if you defeat a creature of the listed types.

card.name: Keeper of the Passage
card.text: Unique. Círdan specific. Place this card in your mp. Whenever Círdan’s company defeats a hazard creature attack (or manifestation thereof) keyed to a Coastal Sea [c] region (by type or name) or to/at a site in such a region, place it with this card. If there are 3 hazards with this card (or any unique hazard) it is worth mp equal to the mp total of the cards placed with it (to a maximum of 3; maximum of 5 if a manifestation of Eärcaraxë is present). Creatures placed with this card still yield kill mp (if any).

card.name: Kinsman and Ambassador
card.text: Unique. Círdan specific. Playable on Galdor or Tharudan. +1 to his EI. Target character requires only 2 points of influence to control and may only be controlled by Círdan or GI. If he is the highest mind Elf in the company he is a leader. Additionally, he may tap to cancel a detainment attack against his company.

card.name: Lady of Many Gifts
card.text: Unique. Galadriel specific. Place this card on Galadriel if she is in play. tap: during the organization phase (if on Galadriel) to take Phial of Galadriel, Three Golden Hairs, or an item only playable at Lórien from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Lady of Many Songs
card.text: Unique. Galadriel specific. Place this card on Galadriel if she is in play. tap: during your end-of-turn phase (if on Galadriel) to take one Elf-song, Healing Song or Song of the Lady from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Lady of Many Visions
card.text: Unique. Galadriel specific. Place this card onGaladriel if she is in play. tap: during your end-of-turn phase (if on Galadriel) to take one Mirror of Galadriel, Soul-piercing or Show Things Unbidden from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Legendary Hunt
card.text: Unique. Thranduil specific. Playable on Thranduil if he isin a company with at least 3 Elf warriors, if The King’s Hunting is in play and you have at least 7 P. Discard this card if these requirements are not met. You may play The Hunt on Thranduil as if he were Alatar. tap: during your end-of-turn-phase to take one The Hunt from your discard pile to your hand. If Thranduil defeats a creature using The Hunt, you may invert this card to bring one The Great Hunt from your sideboard to your deck (reshuffle), which may be played as if you were Alatar.

card.name: Long-time Visitor
card.text: Unique. Elrond specific. Playable if Foster home of Royal Heirs is in play. Strider may be brought into play at Rivendell under Elrond’s EI: place this card on him when he enters play. Strider may only be controlled by Elrond or GI. You may replace Strider with Aragorn II (place this card on Aragorn), in which case he may also be controlled by Arwen.

card.name: Lord of Wood and Beast
card.text: Unique. Thranduil specific. Playable if you have at least 4 P. Your animal factions playable at sites in Woodland Realm and its adjacent regions are worth 2 mp. You receive this card’s mp if there are at least 3 different animal factions in play at different sites in these regions (only 1 copy may be in play per site by any player).

card.name: Master Healer
card.text: Playable on Elrond or Nestador. Target character may tap to discard a dark enchantment from another character in his company. Additionally, you may play Herb-lore on him as if on Radagast (it affects him as if he were Radagast). tap: during your end-of-turn phase to take one Healing Song, Herb-lore or Warm Now be Heart and Limbs from your discard pile to your hand. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Moon Runes
card.text: Unique. Elrond specific. Place this card on Elrondif he is in play. If on Elrond, you can play Dwarf characters and Dwarf factions and these are worth full mp to you. Additionally, Unhappy Blows and The Dark Days do not affect a company containing Elrond.

card.name: Order of Jewel and Ring-smiths
card.text: Elf-lord only. You may play and use miniontreasure items as hero items. Your ring and treasure items borne by Elves are worth full mp. Additionally, you may tap an Elf at a site in Hollin to take Gwaith-i-Mirdain from your discard pile to your hand. tap: and tap an Elf sage controlling an ore resource to place a Reforging with an item in the company that can be restored; discard the ore resource. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Possessions of the Green-elves
card.text: Elf-lord or Elessar only. Playable on a Lordhaven [H]. tap: and tap an Elf with mind 5 or more (or any Nando or Silvan Elf) at the site to let him take control of one of the following items: Arrows Shorn of Ebony, Bow of Yew, Elven-cloak, Elven-rope. If Galadriel or Thranduil taps you may play Emerald of Doriath instead. The item may be played from your discard pile, sideboard or hand. Afterwards the Elf must make a CC. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

card.name: Possessions of the High-elves
card.text: Elf-lord or Elessar only. Playable on a Lordhaven [H]. tap: and tap an Elf with mind 5 or more (or any Noldo or Sinda Elf) at the site to let him take control of one of the following items: Adamant Helmet, Elf-stone, Miruvor, Scabbard of Chalcedony. If Círdan or Elrond taps you may play Jewel of Beleriand instead. The item may be played from your discard pile, sideboard or hand. Afterwards the Elf must make a CC. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

card.name: Prince of Mirkwood
card.text: Unique. Thranduil specific. Playable on Legolas. He requires only 2 points of influence to control and can onlybe controlled by Thranduil or GI. Additionally, Legolas gains the ranger skill and receives +1 prowess against Orcs and Spiders. If he is the highest mind Elf in the company he is a leader. Discard this card if Legolas is not in a company with Thranduil and moves to a site not in Woodland Realm or its adjacent regions. tap: during your end-turn-phase to bring one ManyTurns and Doublings from your discard pile to your play deck.

card.name: Realm of Narya
card.text: Unique. Place this card on Círdan if he is in play. Discard this card if Gandalf or Ring of Fire is in play by an opponent. If on Círdan, he may use Narya and Ring of Fire as if he were Gandalf. If this card is in your pool, Ring of Fire may be included in your play deck.

card.name: Ring of Air
card.text: Unique. Elrond specific. Place this card on Elrond if he is in play. tap: during your end-of-turn phase (if on Elrond) to take one Vilya from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Ring of Water
card.text: Unique. Galadriel specific. Place this card on Galadriel if she is in play. tap: during your end-of-turn phase (if on Galadriel) to take one Nenya from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Sworn to the Lord
card.text: Lord-player only. Place this card on your Lord when he is in play. Followers of your Lord cannot be the target of hazards that would return them to your hand (e.g. Call of Home). Additionally, +2 to your rolls for influence attempts against your characters that have the same home site as your Lord, and for rolls required by hazards that would return such character to your hand or split him off from the company.Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: The Elf-king
card.text: Unique. Elf-lord only. Playable on your Elf-lord, if you have in play at least: 12 stage points, 4 unique Elf characters, 1 unique Elf faction, and if your Elf-lord controls a stage card giving at least 1 CP and an item giving a combined mp / CP of 7 or more. Discard if these conditions are not met. The region in which your protected Lord-haven [h]H] is located becomes a Free-domain [f].

card.name: The House's Library
card.text: Elrond specific. Playable on a sage at Rivendell(or in your starting company). Character may use spirit-magic. Additionally, if Praise to Elbereth is played all characters in the company receive +2 to their rolls for removing corruption cards untill the end of the turn. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: The King's Hunting
card.text: Unique. Thranduil specific. Place this card on Thranduil if he is in play. You receive full mp for Clean the Greenwood. tap: during your end-of-turn phase (if on Thranduil) to take one warrior only resource from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: The Sea's Prowess
card.text: Unique. Círdan specific. Place this card on Círdan if he is in play. You may play Kindling of the Spirit on Círdan as if he were a Wizard. tap: during your end-of-turn phase (if on Círdan) to take one Belegaer, The Reach of Ulmo, or Kindling of the Spirit from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: The Trees Have Ears
card.text: Playable only if you are Gandalf, Radagastor Thranduil. Each time an opponent’s company moves through the region of your avatar’s current site (or region adjacent) you may look at 2 random cards from his hand for each Wilderness [w] in that company’s site path.Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Trusted Counsellor
card.text: Lord-player only. Playable on a character of the same race as your Lord. +1 to his EI. Target character may only be controlled by your Lord or GI. He requires 7 points of influence to control; if your Lord and the character have the same home site or are blood relatives (in a direct line), the character requires only 5 points of influence to control. Cannot be duplicated by a given player.

card.name: Wardens of the Woodland Realm
card.text: Unique. Thranduil specific. Place this card on Thranduil if he is in play. Woodland Realm becomes a Wilderness [w]. Any attack against any of your companies keyed to this region may be cancelled by discarding from hand a creature with an asterix (*) which could be played keyed to this region. tap: during your end-turn-phase to take one Elf-path or Refuge from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Knowledge of Narya
card.text: Stolen knowledge. Scout only. Playable during the site phase on a lone scout minion at the same non-Haven [H] site as an opponent’s Gandalf (or opponent’s Círdan if Realm of Narya is in play). Tap the scout. This card may be stored at Barad-dûr or a Darkhaven [K]. If stored it is worth 4 mp and Gandalf (resp. Círdan) receives -1 to all his CC. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Knowledge of Nenya
card.text: Stolen knowledge. Elf only. Playable during the site phase at Lórien on an Elf in a covert company, if Galadriel is thereor is not in play. Target Elf faces an attack: Elf — 1 strike with 12 prowess (detainment; cannot be cancelled). If the strike is successful the character is taken prisoner at Lórien (Rescue-attack: exact duplicate of all automatic-attacks). Otherwise tap the character or discard this card. This card may be stored at Barad-dûr or a Darkhaven [K]. If stored it is worth 4 mp and all characters with Lórien as a home site receive +1 mind. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Knowledge of Vilya
card.text: Stolen knowledge. Elf only. Playable during the site phase at Rivendell on an Elf in a covert company, if Elrond is at Rivendell or is not in play. Target Elf faces an attack: Elf — 1 strike with 13 prowess (detainment; cannot be cancelled). If the strike is successful the character is taken prisoner at Rivendell (Rescue-attack: exact duplicate of all automatic-attacks). Otherwise tap the character or discard this card. This card may be stored at Barad-dûr or a Darkhaven [h] K]. If stored it is worth 4 mp, and all characters with Rivendell as a home site receive +1 mind.

card.name: Ring of Adamant
card.text: Unique. Elven Ring. Playable on any character that taps after CvCC, if opponent’s Galadriel was wounded during the combat. May also be played at Lórien, if you have a stored Knowledge of Nenya and if no manifestation of Galadriel is in play.Values in parenthesis apply to an Elf bearer. Nenya may not be played. tap: ignore 1 region in the company’s site path (of your choice, both name and type) for the purpose of all hazards; bearer makes a CC modified by -1.

card.name: Ring of Ruby
card.text: Unique. Elven Ring. Playable on any character that taps after CvCC, if opponent’s Gandalf was wounded during the combat. May also be played at any Elf- or Dwarf-hold, if you have a stored Knowledge of Narya and neither a manifestation of Gandalf nor Realm of Narya is in play.Values in parenthesis apply to an Elf bearer. Narya may not be played. tap: at any time to untap up to 2 characters in the company; bearer makes a CC modified by -2.

card.name: Ring of Saphire
card.text: Unique. Elven Ring. Playable on any character that taps after CvCC, if opponent’s Elrond was wounded during the combat. May also be played at Rivendell if you have a stored Knowledge of Vilya and no manifestation of Elrond is in play.Values in parenthesis apply to an Elf bearer. Vilya may not be played. taBearer may tap during the organization phase to take any one minion resource event from your discard pile to your hand (show opponent). Bearer makes a CC modified by -1.

card.name: They Are Accounted For
card.text: Black player only. All ring tests are modified by: +1 for every Elven Ring in play; +1 for every 2 Dwarven Rings in play; +1 for every 3 Man Rings in play; and +1 for every 5 other rings in play. Discard this card if The One Ring comes into play. Cannot be duplicated.

attr.value: Elves — 2 strikes with 8 prowess (detainment against hero companies)
Hollin. Tap an Elf with mind of 5 or more to make major or gold ring items playable at the site this turn.
Elves — 2 strikes with 8 prowess (detainment against covert companies)
Hollin. Any minion Elf may be brought into play at this site under EI. Slew the Great Warrior may be played at this site regardless of the requirement to have a faction in play.

* A character with Thranduil's Halls as a home site may tap to cancel this automatic-attack.

*A character with Thranduil's Halls as a home site may tap to cancel this automatic-attack. The first Elf creature played on a company at or moving to this site does not count against the hazard limit.
Elves — 2 strikes with 8 prowess (detainment if the company contains an Elf)

Hidden site. Tap an Elf to reveal this site. If Huinen is at this site, tap the site to look at opponent's hand; tap Huinen and make a CC to place any number of hazards from opponent's hand either on top or bottom of his play deck.
Elves — 2 strikes with 10 prowess (detainment if the company contains an Elf and Huinen is not at the site)
Hidden site. Tap an Elf to reveal this site.
Port on Taurduin. If you move to this site using Port-on-River movement, any Elf in the company may tap to play Old Winyards at this site (as if at a Border-hold [B]).
Elves - 3 strikes with 8 prowess (detainment against covert companies); Elves - 2 strikes with 9 prowess (detainment against covert companies)

Only Elf and Maia creatures with an (*) may be played keyed to this site. Special items playable at Lórien are playable at this site. An Elf or Dúnadan may tap during the site phase to remove a corruption card on another character in his company. Both characters must make CC afterwards.
Information, Items* (minor, major, gold ring) *—non-battle-gear items only—
(1st) Elves — 3 strikes with 7 prowess; (2nd) Elves — 2 strikes with 8 prowess; (3rd) Elves — 1 strike with 9 prowess
Any company moving to this site has its hazard limit increased by 1.
Undead. Awakened Plant — 2 strikes with 8 prowess; each character wounded must make a CC.
Undead. Awakened Plant — 2 strikes with 8 prowess; each character wounded must make a CC
Elves — 3 strikes with 11 prowess (only if you have 12 P or more).

Port. You cannot play any card which would make this site a Haven [H]. This site may not be used by overt companies. This site must be used as a site card for Edhellond by all Lord and Fallen-wizard players' companies with 12 or more P.
Elves — 3 strikes with 11 prowess (only if you have 12 P or more)

Port. You cannot play any card which would make this site a Haven [H]. This site may not be used by overt companies or if you are Círdan. This site must be used as a site card for Grey Havens by all other Lord and Fallen-wizard players with 12or more P.

Círdan specific. This site is a protected Lordhaven [H]. If one of your companies is at this site, all attacks against it are cancelled. Characters with Grey Havens as a home site may be brought into play at this site regardless of the presence of any other character.

Elf-hold. No characters may be brought into play at this site. You may use this site as a rescue-site instead of Thranduil's Halls: it gains the same automatic-attack(s) as Thranduil's Halls. You must provide anopponent with a copy of this site, when he attemps to move here from Thranduil's Halls.
Elves — 3 strikes with 11 prowess (only if you have 12 P or more)

Port on Anduin. You cannot play any card which would make this site a Haven [H]. This site may not be used by overt companies or if you are Galadriel. This site must be used as a site card for Lórien by all other Lord and Fallen-wizard players with 12 ormore P.

Galadriel specific. This site is a protected Lordhaven [H]. If one of your companies is at this site, all attacks against it are cancelled. Characters with Lórien as a home site may be brought into play at this site regardless of the presence of any other character.
Undead — 3 strikes with 9 prowess; cannot be cancelled by a skill card; each character wounded must make a CC
Characters at this site have their CC modified by -1.
Undead — 3 strikes with 9 prowess; cannot be cancelled by a skill card; each character wounded must make a CC
Non-Nazgûl creatures keyed to the siteattack normally, not as detainment. Characters at this site have their CC modified by -1.

(1st) Traps — 2 strikes with 11 prowess; (2nd) Opponent may play as an automatic-attack one Nameless Thing, Watcher in the Water or an Elf creature from his hand; keep the creature with the site (as a 2nd automatic-attack) until it is defeated or the site leaves active play.

Hidden site. When this site is revealed the company must discard a Stolen Knowledge card it controls. When a gold ring is tested in a company at this site, the result of the roll is modified by +3. Contains a hoard.

(1st) Traps — 2 strikes with 11 prowess; (2nd) Opponent may play as an automatic-attack one Nameless Thing, Watcher in the Water or an Elf creature from his hand; keep the creature with the site (as a 2nd automatic-attack) until it is defeated or the site leaves active play.

Hidden site. When this site is revealed the company must discard a Stolen Knowledge card it controls. When a gold ring is tested in a company at this site, the result of the roll is modified by +3. Contains a hoard.
(1st) Elves — each character faces a strike with 9 prowess (detainment against covert companies); (2nd) Animals (Elvish Hounds) — 4 strikes with 9 prowess (against overt companies only).
Port on Sea of Rhûn. Any company moving to this site has its hazard limit increased by 2. A minion company may not attack another company at this site. A Ringwraith may not move to this site.
Elves — 3 strikes with 11 prowess (only if you have 12 P or more)

You cannot play any card which would make this site a Haven [H]. This site may not be used by overt companies or if you are Elrond. This site must be used as a site card for Rivendell by all other Lord and Fallen-wizard players with 12 or more P.

Elrond specific. This site is a protected Lordhaven [H]. If one of your companies is at this site, all attacks against it are cancelled. Characters with Rivendell as a home site may be brought into play at this site regardless of the presence of any other character.
(1st) Men — 2 strikes with 7 prowess; (2nd)* Trap — 1 strike with 10 prowess
* 2nd automatic-attack need only be faced if the company intends to play a gold ring item.
(1st) Men — 2 strikes with 7 prowess; (2nd)* Trap — 1 strike with 10 prowess

Contains a hoard. *2nd automatic-attack need only be faced if the company intends to play a gold ring item. One non-unique Elf creature may be played regardless of the site path and not counting against the hazard limit against a company at or moving to this site.
Elves — 3 strikes with 11 prowess (only if you have 12 P or more)

You cannot play any card which would make this site a Haven [H]. This site may not be used by overt companies or if you are Thranduil. This site must be used as a site card for Thranduil's Halls by all other Lord and Fallen-wizard players with 12 or more P.

Thranduil specific. This site is a protected Lordhaven [H]. If one of your companies is at this site, all attacks against it are cancelled. Characters with Thranduil's Halls as a home site may be brought into play at this site regardless of the presence of any other character.
Only creatures with an (*) may be keyed to the site. Healing effects affect all characters at the site.

Only creatures with an asterix (*) may be keyed to the site. If tapped this site cannot be untapped by any means.
